title: LDAP Delete Entry Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the `deleteEntry` operation in the LDAP connector.

payload.description: Response for the `deleteEntry` method. Indicates success or failure of the entry deletion.

success.description: Indicates whether the LDAP entry was successfully deleted.

message.description: Optional message with additional details about the delete entry operation.

statusCode.description: HTTP-like status code representing the result of the operation (e.g., 200 for success, 400 for invalid input).

headers.description: Headers related to the operation response. May be empty for LDAP operations.
